mapper.select: SELECT SP_NO, A.U_NO, U_ID, U_NAME, P_NO, (SELECT P_NAME FROM TB_USER_PRODUCT C WHERE C.P_NO = A.P_NO) AS P_NAME, SP_TITLE, SP_NAME, SP_PRICE, SP_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(SP_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SP_CREATED_AT, SP_PWD, SP_STATUS FROM TB_USER_SAFE_PRODUCT A INNER JOIN TB_USER B ON A.U_NO = B.U_NO ORDER BY SP_NO
SELECT SP_NO, SP_TITLE, SP_NAME, U_ID, U_NAME, SP_PRICE, SP_CONTENT, SP_CREATED_AT FROM TB_USER_SAFE_PRODUCT A INNER JOIN TB_USER B ON A.U_NO = B.U_NO WHERE SP_NO = #{sp_no}
SELECT SP_PRICE FROM TB_USER_SAFE_PRODUCT WHERE SP_NO = #{sp_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER_SAFE_PRODUCT SET SP_STATUS = '판매완료' where SP_NO = #{sp_no}
